dc_title_s: Epidemiology of Neuropathic Pain in Canada, 2015
dc_description_s: The Epidemiology of Neuropathic Pain in Canada study was conducted through Queen's University School of Nursing and the Department of Anesthesiology and Perioperative Medicine in Kingston, Canada. The survey was piloted in September 2011, and data collection for the main study occurred between November 2011 and September 2012. It was funded by Pfizer Canada.
